name: Dogmatika Genesis
text: Target 1 banished Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Monster, and 1 Effect Monster your opponent controls with the same card type (Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link); return that banished monster to the Extra Deck, and if you do, negate the effects of that opponent's monster. You can only activate 1 "Dogmatika Genesis" per turn.
